title: Unravel
description: I’m Logan Mitchell, and I hold many secrets in my greedy hands.Women?They bow at my feet. Do what I ask and come back for more.But Ellie Wynn, I don’t want her bowing, I want her to kneel.She thought our time together was one night, a twist of fate.How wrong she was.Ellie has been mine since the day I saw her.Little does she know, it wasn’t that night. It was years ago.Well before I even understood she was mine.One taste, one touch, one kiss, and it wasn’t enough.Not for me.I’m prepared to fight dirty, and I plan to succeed.Lies, deceit, and betrayal.Intrigued?You should be.
author: Kathy Coopmans
